channel.title: TTMed On Air Urology Interviews Podcasts
channel.description: By subscribing to this Really Simple Syndication (RSS) feeds from TTMed Urology, advanced users can have new headlines and content previews delivered in an RSS reader or aggregator. RSS offers a convenience because you can subscribe to feeds from several sources and automatically aggregate headlines from all the sources into one list. You can quickly browse the list of new content without visiting each site to search for new info of interest.
channel.copyright: © Copyright 2009 Prous Science S.A.U. a Thomson Reuters business or its licensors
